title: Russian bobsledder disqualified for doping
text:
Russian bobsledder disqualified for doping 12:04am IST - 01:06 
Russian bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has admitted an anti-doping violation and has been disqualified from the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, according to the Court of Arbitration for Sport. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has admitted an anti-doping violation and has been disqualified from the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, according to the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
